attributes.action: Upgrade and Improve London Underground signalling infrastructure
attributes.additional_details: There are certain tube lines which are famous for their disrupted service. Metropolitan is a regular offender.
attributes.background: There are numerous signalling failures on London Underground and commuters have to suffer on regular basis. Besides bringing bad reputation and leaving customers frustrated the delays impact economy as well.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The London Underground is run by TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
